purpose: The email invites submissions for the International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC) scheduled for October 15-17, 2025, in Dubrovnik, Croatia. It encourages original research papers, case studies, and industry insights on topics related to sustainable and energy-efficient software systems. Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore as part of the FLTA 2025 proceedings.
evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite you to submit your original research papers, case studies, and industry insights to our upcoming symposium.
STS aims to address the growing demand for sustainable, energy-efficient, and resilient software systems by exploring innovative approaches in technology and system development.
Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore in the proceedings of FLTA 2025.
